author: LongWinded
title: While Recounting Past Mass Shootings, O'Reilly Claims No Public Policy Will Prevent T
text: Posts: 9,495 While Recounting Past Mass Shootings, O'Reilly Claims No Public Policy Will Prevent T The right wing is jumping through so many justifications to keep the money from the MIC and gun manufacturers flowing into them. What a bunch of soulless people who have given their lives to the devil, imho. Quote: Originally Posted by LongWinded The right wing is jumping through so many justifications to keep the money from the MIC and gun manufacturers flowing into them. What a bunch of soulless people who have given their lives to the devil, imho. What people are you talking about? What people are you talking about? He's getting his ass kicked on the other thread so he's redirecting the argument Thanks from Jimmyb and caconservative Location: Wilmette. Illinois Posts: 3,519 O'Reilly is correct- we can never prevent it; but we can reduce it. Jimgorn stated in another thread that a person hell bent on mayhem is go to do it, one way or another. The firearm is just the weapon the miscreant chose or is choosing. They will use whatever tool available! Jimgorn is also correct. I guess I'm in the middle on firearm control. I recognize that there will never be a catch-all solution to these tragedies. I also recognize that the next best thing is available to us, to reduce the numbers of such tragedies! That's where I believe our actions should lead us.
